author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Antec Flux Pro case on Amazon https://geni.us/CaPv
In this week's hardware news recap, we talk about the Stop Killing Games initiative, featuring Ross Scott of Accursed Farms (in full appearance on our GNCA channel), alongside other topics. We also cover the ASUS GC-HPWR connector, ASUS' accidental shipment of an NVIDIA "Radeon" GPU, Intel layoffs, Microsoft layoffs, a Sony PS5 lawsuit over monopolistic practices, and more.

@GNCAInvestigates  Stop Killing Games video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p9ahH6HrtTc
SIGN THE EU CITIZENS' INITIATIVE: https://eci.ec.europa.eu/045/public/#/screen/home

title: HW News - Stop Killing Games, ASUS' 1000W GPU Connector, Lawsuit vs. Sony PS5 Monopolization
